Articles.Content: Hello everybody, I am new to the forums but I have been playing KSP for a while. You guys have a really cool community here.
Welcome to the game, and to the forum, clivman. ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
Thanks! Now we have one more cool member. Welcome!
